missing_skills.suggestion: Highlight any relevant experience or projects where you have worked with Kubernetes and microservices. If none, consider gaining practical knowledge through online tutorials or courses.

Detail specific AI/ML projects you have worked on, focusing on the techniques and methodologies used, as well as any results achieved. If none, consider gaining experience through online courses or side projects.
Mention any relevant experience with React and/or Node.js, or explain how you can quickly ramp up on these technologies if required.

improvement_suggestions.suggested: Led a team of 5 software engineers
improvement_suggestions.reason: Using the exact job title helps better align with the position being applied for

improvement_suggestions.suggested: Led the development and deployment of scalable, high-performance cloud-native applications on AWS
improvement_suggestions.reason: Expanding the description to highlight both the development and deployment aspects, as well as the specific cloud platform used, improves the match with the job requirements

emphasis_suggestions.why_relevant: This experience demonstrates leadership and expertise in software development for the cloud, which aligns well with the job requirements.
emphasis_suggestions.how_to_emphasize: Explain the specific technologies used, the complexity of the projects, and any notable achievements.

emphasis_suggestions.why_relevant: This experience shows that you have management skills, which will be useful in mentoring junior developers.
emphasis_suggestions.how_to_emphasize: Highlight your ability to manage and motivate teams, as well as any successful projects delivered under your leadership.

general_suggestions: Quantify achievements wherever possible (e.g., 'increased productivity by 30%' or 'reduced costs by 25%').
Customize the resume for each job application, highlighting relevant skills and experiences.
